definition: possessing or using or characteristic of or appropriate to supernatural powers, someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
details:
adjective
- possessing or using or characteristic of or appropriate to supernatural powers
= synonyms: charming
noun
- someone who is dazzlingly skilled in any field
= synonyms: champion
- one who practices magic or sorcery
= synonyms: magician, necromancer, sorcerer, thaumaturgist
